licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Licence applies to this document.

This licence applies to this TEI-XML document which is the transformed result work from a previous LaTEX format file out of the synoptic diplomatic edition of the complete poemes of Ausiàs March in all its witnesses.
The licence was added on May 1, 2019.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca Virtual Lluís Vives - Cervantes Virtual

msItem.rubric: f. 40r after end of previous poem, before this one: DE AMOR CANTO. XXXII.

editorialDecl.p: This a TEI-XML adaptation out of the LaTEX version of Ausiàs March's poems' synoptic edition, from all witnesses.

lg.l: Alt e Amor / de hȏhon grȃgran desig s'engȇdras'engendra
y experimȇtexperiment /per tots aquests grahons
me son delits / mas donam'passions
la por de mal / quim fa magrir carn tendra.
E port'al cor / sens fum continu foch
e la calor / nom surt apart de fora.
socorreu me / dins los termens d'un hora
car mos senyals / demostren viure poch.
¶ Metje scient / no te lo cas per ioch
com la calor / no surt apart estrema
l'ignorant veu / que lo malalt no crema
e jutjal sa / puix que mostra bon toch.
Lo paçient / no pora dir son mal,
tot affeblit / ab lengua mal diserta
gest, e color / asats fan descuberta
part del affany /que tant com lo dir val.
¶ Plena de seny / dir vos que vs am no cal
puix crech de çert / ꝗque vs ne teniu per çerta
si be mostrau / que vs esta molt cuberta
çella perque / Amor es desigual.
